shortdesc.ph: Reasons for a user being offline.

plentry.pd: 0: The user has quit the call.

pd.p: 1: The SDK timed out and the user dropped offline because it has not received any data packet for a period of time.
pd.note: If the user quits the call and the message is not passed to the SDK (due to an unreliable channel), the SDK assumes the user dropped offline.

plentry.pd: 2: The client role has changed from the host to the audience.
